Name: Quick Slash
Description: Deals damage to all enemies in range. Increases damage.

Name: Merciless Strike
Description: Wield twin blades and perform a complex flurry of up to seven consecutive strikes. Increases damage.

Name: Juggernaut's Sweep
Description: Continuously deals damage to all surrounding enemies for 1.7 seconds. Increases damage.

Name: Balanced Practitioner
Description: Unleashes a concentrated and complete Martial Instinct that strengthens you. Increases state effects.

Name: Skypiercer
Description: Unleashes Blade Savvy that deals damage to all enemies. Increases damage.

Name: Shadowbreaker
Description: Hold down the button to keep attacking the enemy. You can attack a maximum of 4 times. Increases damage.

Name: Deadly Dash
Description: Charges towards the target and deals damage to enemies in front of you. Increases damage.

Name: Immovable Mountain
Description: Puts you in a Parry stance that provides immunity from control and lasts 2 seconds. Increases state effects.

Name: Windwave
Description: Knocks down and deals damage to all enemies in range. Increases damage.

Name: Broken Moon
Description: Removes control effects and enters a Mercurial state that lasts 3 seconds and deals damage to enemies in front of you. Increases damage.

Name: Hunter's Light
Description: Causes damage to all enemies in an area. Increases damage.

Name: Adrenaline
Description: Enters a Bloodfray state and provides immunity from control and damage for 5 seconds. Reduces skill cooldown.

Name: Hellfire Claw
Description: Causes damage to the enemy or recovers HP for friends. Increases Damage/Healing.

Name: Creeping Pain
Description: Affixes a Soul Marker on the target that explodes after 3 seconds, damaging enemies or healing teammates. Increases damage, healing and state effects.

Name: Demon's Rancor
Description: Creates up to five Demon's Rancors that continuously attack for 2 seconds. Increases damage and healing effects.

Name: Grasping Spirits
Description: For 5 seconds, continuously recovers HP for allies or deals damage to enemies in range. Increases damage and healing.

Name: Occultist's Will
Description: Releases a light orb that deals damage or healing through Flourish. Increases Damage/Healing.

Name: Occultist's Gift
Description: Summons an Occultist's Gift at the target location for 300 seconds. Increases state effects.

Name: Adapt
Description: Switches between Light Bringer and Dark Warden states and swaps special skill points. Increases state effects.

Name: Shattered Abyss
Description: Detonates summoned Occultist's Gifts. Increases damage and healing.

Name: Gate of Atrophy
Description: Summons a Gate of Atrophy 5 meters ahead that affects allies or enemies passing through for 5 seconds. Increases state effects.

Name: Spirit's Return
Description: Removes control, grants protection, and returns you near your totem. Reduces skill cooldown and increases state effects.

Name: Demon Shackle
Description: Imprisons the target with Spacetime Field and absorbs damage. Cooldowns differ between Light Bringer and Dark Warden states. Increases state effects.

Name: Void Cycle
Description: Removes control states and swaps positions with a chosen target. Reduces cooldown and increases damage and healing effects.

Name: Spirit Strike
Description: Deals minor damage equal to 35% of magic attack plus 543-664 damage.

Name: Firefly
Description: Applies Firefly for 6 seconds, dealing 50.8% of magic attack plus 727 damage every 2 seconds.

Name: Blue Bird
Description: Damages enemies in a targeted area for 5 seconds, dealing 114.6% of magic attack plus 1779-2174 damage and reducing movement speed by 5%.

Name: Spring Breeze
Description: Heals allies over 10 seconds, stacking up to three times for 58.1% of healing power plus 298-395 health.

Name: Green Vine
Description: Heals the caster and nearby teammates.

Name: Falling Sakura
Description: Heals a targeted ally for 338.7% of healing power plus 1742-2129 health.
